Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item not only stands as a testament to quality but also comes with a unique feature that we believe could greatly benefit you. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I propose a special introductory price of $150 for you. Don't miss out on this opportunity to experience the unparalleled excellence of our product at an exclusive rate. Let's make this deal happen! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
